title: Yale Conexis L1 smart lock
extract: The Yale Conexis App. ... Give family and friends access by sending them a virtual key to their smartphone and keep track of who comes and goes via the app. Twist & GoTM - To open the lock with the app simply touch the lock to wake up the Bluetooth function and twist your phone 90 degrees.
extract_html: The Yale Conexis App. ... Give family and friends access by sending them a virtual key to their smartphone and keep track of who comes and goes via the app. Twist & GoTM - To open the lock with the app simply touch the lock to wake up the Bluetooth function and twist your phone 90 degrees.
